summary_text: Douglas, a record salesman, is an obsessive fan of actress Sally Ross. When his letters are rejected, he strikes out at her and her loved ones.

name: Sonar Kella
summary_text: A young boy becomes a target for crooks, after he claims to remember his past life and mentions precious jewels in a golden fortress.

name: Kavan
summary_text: A TV journalist goes against his corrupt and dishonest boss's orders and helps a group of youngsters in their fight against a chemical plant.

name: Die verlorene Zeit
summary_text: A Polish man rescues a Jewish woman during the chaos of WWII, but they become separated until a chance encounter over thirty years later in New York reunites them.

name: De laatste dagen van Emma Blank
summary_text: A woman living in a large country home drives her servants to mutiny with her outrageous demands as she waits for death to come for her.

name: Amarelo Manga
summary_text: Short stories revolving around a bar and a hotel in Recife, unveil a mosaic of exotic characters living in the Brazilian underground.

name: Angie
summary_text: Angie lives in Bensonhurst Brooklyn, and dreams of a better life. When she finds out she's pregnant - by her boyfriend, Vinnie, she decides she'll have the baby; but not Vinnie as a husband...                See full summary »

name: They Made Me a Criminal
summary_text: A boxer flees believing he has comitted a murder while he was drunk.

name: Sevkat Yerimdar
summary_text: Sevkat Yerimdar, with his most prominent features of being ill-tempered and nosy, have risen among the other characters from the skits and after a short journey through television he is ready to meet the cinema audience.

name: Rewers
summary_text: A story about women, set in the present and in 1950s Warsaw. The main character is Sabina, a quiet, shy woman who has just turned thirty. Clearly, she lacks a man in her life. Her mother ...                See full summary »

name: Änglagård - Andra sommaren
summary_text: Fanny and Zack is back, after she inherited Änglagård last year. Everytone looks forward to their new stay. Axel has told Fanny he is her father, but who else? Ivar also thinks he is her father. Be ready for expectations and confusions.

name: Under the Mountain
summary_text: Teenage twins Rachel and Theo travel to Auckland to stay with relatives after their mother suddenly dies. They find an alien environment and overhear Mr. Wilberforce talking about something stirring beneath the ground - the fire-raiser.

name: Rites of Spring
summary_text: A ransom scheme turns into a nightmare for a group of kidnappers who become victims of a horrifying secret that must be paid every spring.

name: International Khiladi
summary_text: Devraj, a gangster and Payal, a reporter fell in love. Amit, loves Payal and a lot of trouble follows in their lives.

name: L'hermine
summary_text: Michel Racine is a feared president of Assize Court, as strict with himself as with others. Everything changes when he meets again Ditte when she's selected as a juror in a criminal trial over which he presides.

name: Alien Arrival
summary_text: A tech is sprung from prison by a revolutionary leader who promises him an opportunity to save his father from a scheduled execution if he completes a data-stealing mission. But it goes awry, stranding him on a strange alien moon.

name: Bojhena Shey Bojhena
summary_text: A horrible accident takes place between two buses on the highway in Behrampore which includes students returning after winning their kabadi match, a newly-wed couple, a lover taking his ...                See full summary »

name: Naughty or Nice
summary_text: Holiday humbug Krissy Kringle receives a special delivery intended for Santa Claus, the Naughty or Nice book he left behind while visiting a child, and uses the power of the book to expose ...                See full summary »

name: Headhunter
summary_text: Martin Vinge, (35), former notorious journalist, now successful headhunter with a complicated personal life, is in all confidentiality contacted by 85 year-old N.F. Sieger, S.E.O. of ...                See full summary »

name: Just Buried
summary_text: A young man inherits a nearly bankrupt funeral home from his estranged father. He falls in love with the alluring young mortician, only to find out she's offing people to keep the place in business!

name: Dr. Goldfoot and the Bikini Machine
summary_text: Skirt-chasing SIC agent Craig Gamble and millionaire bachelor Todd Armstrong set out to foil mad scientist Dr. Goldfoot's plot to use his army of bikini-clad robots to seduce wealthy men into signing over their assets.

name: Green Mansions
summary_text: A young man in the jungles of Venezuela meets a strange girl of the forest and falls in love with her.

name: Love Will Take Over
summary_text: Sushrut, a garba teacher, who falls in love with NRI girl Michelle when she visits town during festival

name: Scusate se esisto!
summary_text: Serena Bruno returns to Italy to be an architect and help people but she will struggle to convince her fellow co-workers that they have to be more open minded.

name: Come Sunday
summary_text: Evangelist Carlton Pearson is ostracized by his church for preaching that there is no Hell.

name: Eldorado
summary_text: Yvan finds a burglar in his house. He doesn't call the police and decides to give the young man a lift home to his parents.

name: Affinity
summary_text: A grieving upper class woman becomes a "Lady Visitor" at Millbank prison, hoping to escape her troubles and be a guiding figure in the lives of the female prisoners. Of all her friendships ...                See full summary »

name: Jiminy Glick in Lalawood
summary_text: Culture critic Jiminy Glick gets tied up in a murder case at the Toronto Film Festival.

name: Where Angels Fear to Tread
summary_text: After a rich Edwardian widow impulsively marries a handsome but poor Tuscan dentist and dies in childbirth, her English in-laws try to gain custody of the baby.

name: Enemies, A Love Story
summary_text: A ghostwriter finds himself romantically involved with his current wife, a married woman and his long-vanished wife.

name: Creepozoids
summary_text: A group of survivors try to avoid the battles of World War III. When they try to escape to the quiet lands, they encounter something much more deadly.

name: Bloody Moon
summary_text: Girls are killed at a language-school in Spain.

name: Sacrifice!
summary_text: After a photographer is captured by a primitive tribe, his life is spared and he's accepted into the village after the chief's daughter falls for him, but he has to survive the jungle's harsh life, including the cannibals.

name: The Seduction of Mimi
summary_text: Mimí, forced to leave his family in Sicily, finds a job in a factory in Turin, where he gets involved in an extramarital affair.

name: The 3 Penny Opera
summary_text: In London at the turn of the century, the bandit Mack the Knife marries Polly without the knowledge of her father, Peachum, the 'king of the beggars'.

name: Bulhandang
summary_text: A young cop finds his loyalties divided after befriending a notorious criminal while undercover in prison.

name: The Farewell Party
summary_text: Residents of a retirement home build a machine for self-euthanasia in order to help their terminally ill friend, though they are faced with a series of dilemmas when rumors of the machine begin to spread.

name: 40 Days and Nights
summary_text: When a colossal tectonic shift causes the sea level to start rising, a microbiologist gathers the DNA of as many species as she can, while the military creates an "ark" in a desperate attempt to preserve life on Earth.

name: The Hooligan Factory
summary_text: Danny wants something more. Expelled from school and living in his grandfathers flat, he longs to live up to the image of his estranged father Danny Senior. Sent to prison for force feeding...                See full summary »

name: Ben 10: Secret of the Omnitrix
summary_text: When the Omnitrix begins a countdown to self-destruction, Ben and Gwen team up with Tetrax to find the watch's creator before it's too late.

name: Jism
summary_text: When an unemployed man falls for a wealthy woman and he is willing to do whatever he must to get her away from her abusive husband.

name: Paperback Hero
summary_text: An Australian truck driver writes romance novels. His engaged, tomboyish, crop duster best friend's name, Ruby Vale, is unasked used as author. Complications arise when his novel takes off. Will they remain friends or...?

name: Mistress
summary_text: This self-effacing comedy about film industry blues stars Robert Wuhl and Martin Landau as a writer/producer duo who must deal with the increasingly fickle demands of their film's financiers (Danny Aiello, Robert De Niro and Eli Wallach).

name: Starchaser: The Legend of Orin

name: Uptown Saturday Night
summary_text: At Madame Zenobia's illegal nightclub, when Steve Jackson and Wardell Franklin get robbed of their wallets containing a winning lottery ticket, they set out to recover it.

name: The Call
summary_text: In the fall of 1987, a group of small-town friends must survive the night in the home of a sinister couple after a tragic accident brings them to the couple's door.

name: Medicine for Melancholy
summary_text: Twenty-four hours in the tentative relationship of two young San Franciscans also dealing with the conundrum of being a minority in a rapidly gentrifying city.

name: Donkey Xote
summary_text: A story of don Quijote told by a donkey of Sancho Panza...

name: Undefeatable
summary_text: Kristi Jones (Cynthia Rothrock) avenges her sister's death at the hands of a crazed martial arts rapist.

name: Blue
summary_text: Against a plain, unchanging blue screen, a densely interwoven soundtrack of voices, sound effects and music attempt to convey a portrait of Derek Jarman's experiences with AIDS, both ...                See full summary »

name: The Tenants
summary_text: The tenants of a rundown building on the outskirts of Tehran with no legal heir face major housing problems to deal with: major repairs and threat of eviction by greedy building manager who wants to own the building.

name: The Family
summary_text: With the background of the XX century Italian history, Carlo, a retired teacher, traces the vicissitudes of his family.

name: The Dead Center
summary_text: A hospital psychiatrist's own sanity is pushed to the edge when a frightened amnesiac patient insists that he has died and brought something terrible back from the other side.

name: The Swordsman
summary_text: Three different swordsmen -- a swordsman who is going blind, the best swordsman in Joseon Dynasty, and the best swordsman in Qing Dynasty who aspires to be the best even in the Joseon Dynasty -- meet each other for their own reasons.

name: River
summary_text: In the south of Laos, an American volunteer doctor becomes a fugitive after he intervenes in the sexual assault of a young woman. When the assailant's body is pulled from the Mekong River, things quickly spiral out of control.

name: Angels Sing
summary_text: As a child, Michael Walker wished every day could be Christmas. That is, until a tragic accident crushed his holiday spirit. Thirty years later, Michael still can't muster any joy for the ...                See full summary »

name: Gigante
summary_text: A chronicle of a supermarket security guard's obsession with a late-shift janitor.

name: Firaaq
summary_text: Chronicles the devastating impact on vulnerable Muslims in Gujarat after riots.

name: Christina's House
summary_text: A teenage girl is plagued by bizarre occurrences and deaths related to her new home.

name: Fresh Bait
summary_text: Three teenagers plan to steal the necessary funds to open their dream shop in the US, but things get messy.

name: The Return of the Vampire
summary_text: When an errant bomb unearths the coffin of a vampire during the London Blitz, a gravedigger unknowingly reanimates the monster by removing the stake from his heart

name: Embers
summary_text: After a global neurological epidemic, those who remain search for meaning and connection in a world without memory.

name: Nemesis Game
summary_text: An introspective university student with an unhealthy interest in riddles and puzzles becomes involved in a sinister mind game that results in murder.

name: The Italian Connection
summary_text: A Milanese pimp is pursued by - and then pursues - a pair of New York hitmen and the gangsters who framed him for stealing a shipment of heroin.

name: The Magic Sword
summary_text: The son of a sorceress, armed with weapons, armour and six magically summoned knights, embarks on a quest to save a princess from a vengeful wizard.

name: Anjathe
summary_text: Sathya and Kiruba are friends. Sathya is reckless and gets into drinking and violent fights whereas Kiruba studies hard to become a Sub-Inspector. Tables are turned when Sathya becomes a Sub-Inspector.

name: Groupies bleiben nicht zum Frühstück
summary_text: Lila, a girl who returns to Berlin after being abroad for a year, meets Chris. She falls in love with him, but what she doesn't know is that Chris is a famous rock star with many fans chasing him around, including her little sister.

name: InuYasha the Movie 3: Swords of an Honorable Ruler
summary_text: The legendary sword, So'unga, which belonged to the Great Dog Demon, has been unleashed. It seeks to cover the Earth in an eternal Hell and end all life on it. Inuyasha must join forces ...                See full summary »

name: Inconscientes
summary_text: Barcelona, 1913. Alma is perhaps the most modern woman of her time. Her father is the most prestigious brain surgeon in the country. His husband is also her psychiatrist, and a disciple of a certain revolutionary Doctor called Freud.

name: Prince Valiant
summary_text: In a time now lost in the mists of memory, the great King Arthur rules in the legendary citadel that is Camelot. His Knights of the Round Table perform acts of derring-do and spend their ...                See full summary »

name: Unhook the Stars
summary_text: After her abusive husband leaves, Monica asks her neighbor to look after her son while she's at work. Mildred's angry daughter's just moved out, so she's happy to have JJ.

name: Martial Arts of Shaolin
summary_text: In ancient China, Zhi Ming trains at the legendary Northern Shaolin temple to avenge the death of his father at the hands of a nefarious magistrate.

name: Mausoleum
summary_text: A 10 year-old girl, mourning the death of her mother, becomes possessed by a demon, who has been preying on her female ancestors for centuries. Years later, the demon starts to take over her, mentally and physically.

name: The Crimson Cult
summary_text: When his brother disappears, Robert Manning pays a visit to the remote country house he was last heard from. While his host is outwardly welcoming, and his niece more demonstrably so, ...                See full summary »

name: Sous les toits de Paris
summary_text: Albert is smitten for Pola but ends up wrongly committed in jail, in the meantime her affections are sought after by his friend, and on his release both love and friendship must be tested.

name: Fantômas: In the Shadow of the Guillotine
summary_text: Inspector Juve is tasked to investigate and capture an infamous criminal Fantomas.

name: Empowered
summary_text: After to visit a Hindi guru healer, Paz loses control over what she says and starts speaking out everything that comes to her mind.

name: Kielletty hedelmä
summary_text: Two teen girls from a very restrictive Conservative Laestadian faith community, go alone to Helsinki for the first time.

name: The Chocolate War
summary_text: A surreal portrait of a Catholic Private School and its hierarchy. A new student must submit to the bizarre rituals of his peers and the expectations of the school's administration by ...                See full summary »

name: Little Forest
summary_text: A young woman grows tired of life in the city and returns to her hometown in the countryside.

name: The Man Who Sold His Skin
summary_text: His own body turned into a living work of art and promptly exhibited in a museum, Sam, a Syrian refugee, will soon realize to have sold away more than just his skin.

name: Thirteen at Dinner
summary_text: An American movie actress, best known for playing dumb blondes, is Scotland Yard's prime suspect when her husband, Lord Edgware, is murdered. The great detective, Hercule Poirot, digs deeper into the case.

name: Un + une
summary_text: French famous film score composer goes to India to compose the score for an Indian adaptation of Romeo and Juliet. There he meets the wife of the French ambassador to India, and a complicated relationship ensues.

name: Walking with the Enemy
summary_text: A young man, separated from his family in World War II, disguises himself as a Nazi S.S. Officer and uncovers more than just his family whereabouts.

name: Deathstroke Knights & Dragons: The Movie
summary_text: Assassin Slade Wilson leads two lives: a relentless killer known as Deathstroke and a family man. Can he atone for the sins of the past-or will his family pay the ultimate price?

name: Viruddh... Family Comes First
summary_text: An ordinary 60 plus couple - Vidhyadhar Patwardhan and his wife are forced to search for their faith in human values and society after the death of their only son Amar. In the process they undergo the most testing struggle of their lives.

name: Vägen ut
summary_text: Reine quits his job because he's tired of his boss. He takes a job at the Kumla Prison in hope that he can set up a play acted by the prisoners, who are not very interested. But they ...                See full summary »

name: See the Sea
summary_text: While waiting her husband return from a business trip, a young woman with a baby is getting close with a strange woman traveler.
